ValidationRule.description: This rule ensures the planner confirms they have reassessed vulnerability for this customer
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
( ISPICKVAL(OW_status__c, "Await fact find") || ISPICKVAL(OW_status__c, "Provide advice") || ISPICKVAL(OW_status__c, "Complete") )
&&
ISCHANGED( OW_status__c )
&&
NOT( OW_vulnerability_reassesed__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please confirm that you have reassessed vulnerability before moving beyond the catch up stage.
